result.execSummary:
The defendant Melissa L. Lewandowski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Marathon County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes: Maintain FTE/schooling or a combination and when not fully engaged, must complete 15 hours of community service per week.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

SAFE program or an equivalent unless already completed.  AODA and follow up unless already completed.  

Court remits DNA sample/surcharge.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

16CM2073:
Ct. 2 (BJ)>>DRI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.
  
PLEA: 
16CM2073:
Ct. 1 (Theft-Movable Property)>>NO CONTEST

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
15CM1696:
Ct. 2 (Disorderly Conduct-Domestic Abuse)>> Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: SAFE Program or an equivilent unless already completed, AODA and Follow up unless already completed, Counseling as recommended, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination and when not fully engaged must complete 15 Hours of Community Service per week, Court Costs including Domestic Abuse Surcharge. Court remits DNA Sample and Surcharge.

16CM2073:
Ct. 1 (Theft-Movable Property)>>  Sentence W/H- 1 Year Probation, Concurrent. If defendant is in full compliance with all terms and conditions of written DEJ agreement within that time frame and obtains no new criminal charges, State to DISMISS Ct. 1.

Shall not consume alcohol. Absolute sobriety from alcohol. No bars, taverns, liquor stores, or beer tents unless for work purposes ONLY. WPD police escort to retrieve any personal belongings.   No contact with victim(s): J.B. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
